text:
For <java> task the attribute logError="true" is used to separate standard output stream from the error output strem. 
But when 'inputstring' attrubute is set the 'logError' attribute is ignored and the error output is included in the standard output.

Example#1: <java classname="SomeClass" output="standard.txt" logError="true"/> error output from SomeClass goes to Ant's log.

Example#2: <java classname="SomeClass" output="standard.txt" logError="true" inputstream=""/> error output from SomeClass goes to standard.txt.
